section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: BiographyStatement sampleBibs: - 72947 fieldSpec: - 545ab trimPunctuation: false scriptInclusion: NONE

substep.cmd: If subfield b is present, join the string values of 545ab with a whitespace character.
Else, output the value of subfield 545a.

stepresult.note: This example is meant to illustrate a biography statement and does not represent a complete JSON-LD document.
